actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act and related provisions of law to extend the supplemental-security income benefit program to Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and Guam on the same basis as the States.

summary.text: Amends Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income Program) of the Social Security Act to extend benefits to Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and Guam on the same basis as the States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act and related provisions of law to extend the supplemental-security income benefit program to Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and Guam on the same basis as the States.
